[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@boba-cli/key](./key.md) &gt; [Binding](./key.binding.md) &gt; [enabled](./key.binding.enabled.md)

## Binding.enabled() method

Returns true if this binding is enabled (not disabled and has keys). Disabled bindings won't be matched and won't show up in help.

**Signature:**

```typescript
enabled(): boolean;
```
**Returns:**

boolean
